title: Police investigating deadly hit and run in South Beach
text:
October 13, 2015 Police investigating deadly hit and run in South Beach 
One man dead after hit and run around 2:30 a.m. at Collins Avenue and 11th Street 
Police looking for driver, who fled on foot 
Cops have closed Collins Avenue between 10th and 12th street to investigate 
By Joey Flechas Order Reprint of this Story 
A fatal hit and run left a man dead in South Beach and police searching for the driver. 
Miami Beach police said a silver convertable BMW was driving fast on southbound Collins Avenue around 2:30 a.m. when it hit a man in the crosswalk at 11th Street. 
The man driving the BMW fled on food. Police continue to search for him. 
Three female passengers in the BMW stayed on scene and were detained for questioning by police. 
The pedestrian died on scene. 
Cops have closed a stretch of Collins Avenue as homicide investigators remain on scene. 
â€œCollins Avenue from 10th to 12th Street will be closed for a bit of time as investigate reconstruct accident," said police spokesman Ernesto Rodriguez.
